product_name: Hi-Tec Oakhurst WP Hiking Boots - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With over-the-ankle coverage and waterproof leather uppers, the Hi-Tec Oakhurst Waterproof Womens' Hiking Boots are built to keep your feet feeling great during long days on challenging trails. Waterproof full-grain leather uppers offer flexible durability; synthetic linings wick moisture away from feet for additional comfort. Padded collars protect ankles; gusseted tongues keep out debris, and tongue and heel loops aid entry. Removable EVA insoles and compression-molded EVA midsoles deliver comfortable cushioning and lasting support for long days on the trail. Carbon rubber outsoles offer solid traction on uneven ground. Closeout.
short_description: With over-the-ankle coverage and waterproof leather uppers, the Hi-Tec Oakhurst Waterproof Womens' Hiking Boots are built to keep your feet feeling great during long days on challenging trails.
